org.spongepowered.api.event.entity

Interface EntityExplosionEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BulkBlockEvent, CauseTracked, EntityEvent, Event, GameEvent

    public interface EntityExplosionEvent
extends EntityEvent, BulkBlockEvent
    Represents an event when an explosion already has taken place and blocks are about to be broken/affected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getExplosionLocation()
      Gets the location of the explosion.
      double getYield()
      Gets the damaging yield of the explosion to affect blocks.
      void setYield(double yield)
      Sets the damaging yield of the explosion to affect blocks.

        getEntity

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.block.BulkBlockEvent

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.CauseTracked

        getCause

    • Method Detail

      • getExplosionLocation

        Location getExplosionLocation()
        Gets the location of the explosion. This is separate from the entity as the entity already blew up.
        Returns:
        The location of detonation

      • getYield

        double getYield()
        Gets the damaging yield of the explosion to affect blocks.

        The higher the yield, the more blocks are broken. The yield is between 0 and 100.

        Returns:
        The damaging yield of the explosion

      • setYield

        void setYield(double yield)
        Sets the damaging yield of the explosion to affect blocks.

        The higher the yield, the more blocks are broken. The yield is between 0 and 100.

        Parameters:
        yield - The damaging yield of the explosion
